mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isNavigation,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isPublish,jdbcType=BIT}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{stem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edittime = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_navigation = #{isNavigation,jdbcType=BIT}, is_publish = #{isPublish,jdbcType=BIT}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stem = #{stem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
